title: HELP! Can anyone ID this one?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130038im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/LisaSimpson-2_4943.jpg)

I can’t figure this one out for the life of me.

 [‹ Old Geology Map Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130038/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46339 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font from House Beautiful mag ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130038/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46343 "Go to next forum topic")
author: quantumjean

comments.content:
It’s quite the tough’ie.

—  
Jean Ly  
Quantum Signs & Graphics
Isn’t Lisa Simpson a little young to get married? I wouldn’t expect Marge to allow that.

Actually in one of the episodes, she does get married (well almost) to a British chap she meets in college. Hugh something or other. It was the episode where the Simpsons went to a Renaissances Faire and Lisa visited a fortune teller.

pattyfab:

My client was coincidentally named the same as the cartoon character. I appreciate the effort to be funny— but she now wants something else with this font on it and your post did not help.

—  
Jean Ly  
Quantum Signs & Graphics

barthank:

you’re amazing! thank you so much!
